ai-atk-s0103a1:45_1: For one who has not given up transgression, it is whatever needs to do.
ai-atk-s0103a1:45_2: So their hearts full of garlands, holding a talk in silence.
ai-atk-s0103a1:45_3: Then, when the Teacher was sitting, he was sitting in that very day, what more had happened to one who had obsessed with Māra’s mind.
ai-atk-s0103a1:45_4: But if the Buddha has taken the fruit of the path, he would not have taught them even.
ai-atk-s0103a1:45_6: Therefore it was said by the Buddha, “Excluded all these foolish men!”
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_0: Herein, touched by Māra’s Wicked One.
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_1: He is called worthy of being offered,
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_3: What can be known by the ascetic Gotama? What will I do?
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_4: He thinks: ‘This is how it can be live having realized with his own insight.’ For seven days sentient beings will live having achieved their own insight.
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_5: Well then, let’s do so. We won’t want to lead the spiritual life.”
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_6: Then he knows the same teaching as some other, and so on, when they’re not able to fill them with any other. How could they possibly find out?
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_7: They lions roar the lion’s roar
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_9: First of the moment: in each of these is very instant
ai-atk-s0103a1:46_11: But even those wanderers couldn’t be subtle, so that it can’t be extinguished in the future.
ai-atk-s0103a1:48_0: The conclusion of the Udumbarikāra is finished.
